desc: Whether it's for a special occasion or for everyday wear, New Moon offers an extensive array of high quality, unique hand made pieces, as well as contemporary, antique and ethnic. There are also one off home made creations, skilfully crafted in sterling silver, silver 925, gold and precious gem stones. We design and co

Wide range of sterling silver jewellery for women and men.
